attributes.action: Add high security in schools to prevent unwelcome visitors , keeping school safe
attributes.additional_details:
We protect our shops we protect our banks. We even protect residential hotels but we do not protect our children enough. There has been increasing amounts of unwelcome visitors entering schools , Putting lives at risk. There needs to be a level of safety and security for the most precious things that mean the most.
The UK has become increasingly dangerous and a place of education should be at the highest level of safety.
attributes.background: Higher levels of security in schools that do not have funding to provide electric gates , cameras , safety glass and security guards.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund security guards and CCTV on school premises & introduce new protocols
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738547
